get.description: Media content associated with a story or comment

delete.description: An individual entry in a profile's feed

get.description: An individual entry in a profile's feed

parameters.name: admin_creator
parameters.description: ID of admin who created the post.  Applies to pages only

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: Information about the app this post was published by.

parameters.name: call_to_action
parameters.description: The call to action type used in any Page posts for mobile app engagement ads.

parameters.name: caption
parameters.description: The caption of a link in the post (appears beneath the name).

parameters.name: created_time
parameters.description: The time the post was initially published. For a post about a life event, this will be the date and time of the life event

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description of a link in the post (appears beneath the caption).

parameters.name: feed_targeting
parameters.description: Object that controls news feed targeting for this post. Anyone in these groups will be more likely to see this post, others will be less likely, but may still see it anyway. Any of the targeting fields shown here can be used, none are required (applies to Pages only).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Information about the profile that posted the message.

parameters.name: icon
parameters.description: A link to an icon representing the type of this post.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The post ID

parameters.name: is_hidden
parameters.description: If this post is marked as hidden (applies to Pages only).

parameters.name: is_published
parameters.description: Indicates whether a scheduled post was published (applies to scheduled Page Post only, for users post and instanlty published posts this value is always true)

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: The link attached to this post.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The status message in the post.

parameters.name: message_tags
parameters.description: Profiles tagged in message. This is an object with a unique key for each tag in the message

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the link.

parameters.name: object_id
parameters.description: The ID of any uploaded photo or video attached to the post.

parameters.name: picture
parameters.description: The picture scraped from any link included with the post.

parameters.name: place
parameters.description: Any location information attached to the post.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: The privacy settings of the post.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A list of properties for any attached video, for example, the length of the video.

parameters.name: shares
parameters.description: The shares count of this post.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: A URL to any Flash movie or video file attached to the post.

parameters.name: status_type
parameters.description: Description of the type of a status update.

parameters.name: story
parameters.description: Text from stories not intentionally generated by users, such as those generated when two people become friends, or when someone else posts on the person's wall.

parameters.name: story_tags
parameters.description: Deprecated field, same as message_tags.

parameters.name: targeting
parameters.description: Object that limited the audience for this content. Anyone not in these demographics will not be able to view this content. This will not override any Page-level demographic restrictions that may be in place.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Profiles mentioned or targeted in this post.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A string indicating the object type of this post.

parameters.name: updated_time
parameters.description: The time of the last change to this post, or the comments on it. For a post about a life event, this will be the date and time of the life event

parameters.name: with_tags
parameters.description: Profiles tagged as being 'with' the publisher of the post.

post.description: An individual entry in a profile's feed

get.description: Media content associated with a story or comment

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Text accompanying the attachment

parameters.name: description_tags
parameters.description: Profiles tagged in the text accompanying the attachment

parameters.name: media
parameters.description: Media object (photo, link etc.) contained in the attachment

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Object that the attachment links to

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title of the attachment

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the attachment

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the attachment
